name: soa-lite
description: SOA demo con Gateway, Orchestrator y ESB (Auth, Catalog A, Order B).

scripts.start:all: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Start-Process -WindowStyle Minimized node -ArgumentList 'services/auth-service.js'; Start-Process -WindowStyle Minimized node -ArgumentList 'services/catalog-service.js'; Start-Process -WindowStyle Minimized node -ArgumentList 'services/order-service.js'; Start-Process -WindowStyle Minimized node -ArgumentList 'services/composite-service.js'; Start-Process -WindowStyle Minimized node -ArgumentList 'gateway.js'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1; Write-Host 'Servicios: AUTH:3001  CATALOG:3002  ORDER:3003  ORCH:3004  GATEWAY:3000'"
